graphql.query:
query CustomerSummary1($cif: String!, $cupid: String!, $userSessionId: String!, $accountId: String!, $accountRestrictionsCif2: String!) {
  Customer {
    customerSummary(cif: $cif) {
      household {
        orionId
        orionRepId
        allyHouseholdId
        name
        primaryContact
        assetsUnderManagement
      }
      contact {
        guid
        firstName
        lastName
        dateOfBirth
        ssn
        addresses {
          primary {
            type
            line1
            line2
            line3
            city
            zipCode
            state
            country
            careOf
            endDate
            lastUpdatedAt
          }
          mailing {
            type
            line1
            line2
            line3
            city
            zipCode
            state
            country
            careOf
            endDate
            lastUpdatedAt
          }
        }
        phones {
          type
          value
        }
        emails {
          type
          value
        }
        occupation
        employer
        customerSince
        isEmployee
        altids {
          DEPOSIT
          INVEST
          HOMELOANS
          IDM
        }
        relationships {
          id
          status
          role
          createdDateTime
          relationshipType
          accounts {
            lob
            recordType
            type
            subType
            accountNumber
            dateOpened
            isActive
            status
            currentValue
            availableValue
            managementStyle
            feeSchedule
            portfolioType
            orionAccountId
            accountType
            number
            nickName
            hasPositions
            realtimeTransferLimitCategory
            productType
            balance {
              fundsAvailableToWithdraw
              accountValue
              maxOnlineWithdrawalAmount
            }
            isAccountRestricted
            isAccountClosed
            isManagedPortfolio
            eligibilities {
              type
              eligible
            }
            accountLimits {
              type
              itemLimit
              dailyMaximum
              todaysRemaining
            }
            linkedBankAccounts {
              bank
              accountType
              aba
              number
              achRelationshipId
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
    getCustomerCredentialBlocks(cupid: $cupid, userSessionId: $userSessionId) {
      online_access_status
      online_access_status_flag
      password_status
      password_status_flag
      mfa_status
    }
  }
  Accounts {
    accountRestrictions(accountId: $accountId, cif: $accountRestrictionsCif2) {
      description
      code
      memo
      accountNumber
      expirationDate
      startDate
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
query ExampleQuery($input: BucketTransactionInput) {
  Accounts {
    bucketTransactions(input: $input) {
      bucket {
        toolkitBucketId
        toolkitBucketName
        bucketBalance
        bucketCategoryName
        bucketBalanceLastUpdateDate
        postedTransactions {
          bucketTransactionId
          toolkitBucketId
          transactionDate
          transactionAmount
          transactionDescription
          bucketBalanceAfterPost
          overSpendIndicator
          overSpendAmount
          transactionPostingTime
          groupTransactionId
          transactionTypeId
          accountId
          detailIndicator
          transactionDetails {
            bucketTransactionDetailId
            bucketTransactionId
            fromToolkitBucketId
            fromToolkitBucketName
            toToolkitBucketId
            toToolkitBucketName
            fromBucketBalance
            toBucketBalance
          }
            toolkitAccountId
            merchantId
            merchantName
            transactionTypeName
            created
            isMoveable
            isGreyedOut
            cleansedTransactionAmount
        }
        pendingTransactions {
          bucketTransactionId
          toolkitBucketId
          accountId
          transactionDate
          transactionAmount
          transactionDescription
          merchantId
          isMovable
          isGrayedOut
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

graphql.query:
query Query($input: CustomerInformation!) {
  Customer {
    customerSummary(input: $input) {
      household {
        orionId
        orionRepId
        allyHouseholdId
        name
        primaryContact
        assetsUnderManagement
      }
      contact {
        guid
        firstName
        lastName
        dateOfBirth
        ssn
        addresses {
          primary {
            type
            line1
            line2
            line3
            city
            zipCode
            state
            country
            careOf
            endDate
            lastUpdatedAt
          }
          mailing {
            type
            line1
            line2
            line3
            city
            zipCode
            state
            country
            careOf
            endDate
            lastUpdatedAt
          }
        }
        phones {
          type
          value
        }
        emails {
          type
          value
        }
        occupation
        employer
        customerSince
        isEmployee
        altids {
          DEPOSIT
          INVEST
          HOMELOANS
          IDM
        }
        relationships {
          ... on InvestRelationship {
            id
            status
            role
            createdDateTime
            relationshipType
            self_directed_status
            robo_portfolio_status
            accounts {
              lob
              recordType
              subType
              accountNumber
              isActive
              currentValue
              availableValue
              isManaged
            }
          }
          ... on DefaultRealtionship {
            id
            status
            role
            createdDateTime
            relationshipType
            accounts {
              ... on CustomerSummaryDeposit {
                lob
                recordType
                type
                subType
                accountNumber
                accountId
                dateOpened
                dateClosed
                isActive
                status
                currentValue
                availableValue
                accountCode
                cmgFlag
              }
              ... on CustomerSummaryInvest {
                lob
                recordType
                subType
                accountNumber
                isActive
                currentValue
                availableValue
                isManaged
              }
              ... on CustomerSummaryWealth {
                lob
                recordType
                subType
                accountNumber
                isActive
                currentValue
                availableValue
                isManaged
                managementStyle
                feeSchedule
                portfolioType
                orionAccountId
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
